verbs.description: [ARG1: i] [V: ’m] [ARG2: an iphone user] my friend switched to android and i thought she disappeared for weeks my friend was silent in our imessage group chat even after we realized that her switch from an iphone to an android bounced her out of the conversation our friend group never recovered sam
